00081     public void setSearchEnabled(boolean searchEnabled) {
00082         boolean oldValue = this.searchEnabled;
00083         this.searchEnabled = searchEnabled;
00084         firePropertyChange("searchEnabled", oldValue, this.searchEnabled);
00085     }
00086 
00087     public Boolean isSearchEnabled() {
00088         return searchEnabled;
00089     }

00091     @Action (enabledProperty = "searchEnabled")
00092     public void search() {
00093         System.err.println("Searching");
00094         ScheatorDb.DbObject.Data data = (ScheatorDb.DbObject.Data) seasonList.getSelectedItem();
00095         Integer seasonId = (Integer) data.get("id");
00096         controller.searchMainTable(seasonId);
00097     }

00099     @Action
00100     public void seriesList() {
00101         //seasonModel.fill(seriesList.getSelectedId());
00102         //controller.seriesSelected(seriesList.getSelectedIndex());
00103         Series.Data selected = (Series.Data)seriesModel.getSelectedItem();
00104         Integer id = (Integer) selected.get("id");
00105         seasonModel.update(id);
00106     }

00109     public void seasonList() {

00111             setSearchEnabled(true);
00112             System.err.println("SELECTED");
